divs: Sighting DetailsMy friend and I stopped south of Fulton, NY for a nature call. I looked into the sky and saw an organge cigar shaped object moving slowly from the north. The object stopped and a piece of the same color fell from it and burst into flames. The object then left in the same direction it came from. When I first saw it I said to my friend "look at this thing." My friend blew it off as nothing. I talked to him about 25 years ago (as he moved to Califonia) and he still didn't think it was anything strange. I was really excited and couldn't take my eyes off it. We lost sight of it when it moved away and went behind some trees that were on our left. I emailed Skeptic Magazine about 2 years ago and they told me it was a flair. But flairs ignite and the piece the fell from the object burst into flames and extinguished in a matter of seconds. Still remember this like it happened yesterday.
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Fulton
There were 2 other sightings in Fulton on or around October 28th 1969
